name: Harvest Night
description:
Use Keyboard + Controller to support up to 4 players !

It’s an annual traditional alien harvest festival.This is a festival created by aliens to celebrate the hard work of the past year.

On this festive night, the aliens will bring their families to the circus to watch the performance of slaughtering livestock. In their eyes, human beings are also one of the livestock.

One of the most popular programs is jumping through the fire rings. Human beings need to avoid being chased by harvesters, but also jump through the fire rings to win the applause of the audience.

There will be four players in each game. They can move freely on the four tracks, and get points by jumping through the fire rings. The player who reaches the end and gets the highest score can win.

Action: Players control humans to run, jump and attack each other, and avoid harvest machines.

Goal: Players need to get as many points as possible before the game ends,

Rules: One player controls one character, up to four players. Characters will die if they are caught up by the harvest machines. Characters will be killed by fire rings if they don’t jump through/over the fire rings. Characters will slow down if they step on a banana. Characters will slow down if they get attacked by other players. Characters can get 20 points if they jump through the fire rings, 10 points if they jump over the fire rings. It will take 2s to respawn after the character dies

Playerspace: Alien Circus Theater.

Music by Swngyill YOON @yyyn0889 (Twitter)
